scripts.generate-doc: ./node_modules/.bin/sassdoc index.scss sassdoc --config=.sassdocrc && echo 'Documentation successfully generated in sassdoc/index.html'
scripts.deploy-doc: git add sassdoc && git commit -m 'Compile SassDoc' && git subtree push --prefix sassdoc origin gh-pages && echo 'Documentation successfully deployed to https://salesforce-ux.github.io/sass-deprecate/'
